name: Boyfriend Summon
description:
A gay male/male Choose Your Own Adventure transformation furry sex text game/story.

You are single and bored! How do you fix this? You decide to purchase a magic book and summon the boyfriend of your dreams!

You start with the choice of summoning one of eleven different dream boyfriend types. The choices you make will likely result in at least one transformation for you and/or your new boyfriend. Mostly M/M pairing and sex scenes, but a few choices will result in sex changes (which includes F/M, M/F, and F/F pairings) and there are a few group scenes with more than two characters. The bear and the pup tend to have the weirder fetish scenes.

This is Version 1.03 of Boyfriend Summon. You can find more games on my Patreon, discord, and FurAffinity accounts with the specific links listed on the first page of the actual game. If you would like to support me, then become a patron at https://www.patreon.com/desirelines and you will receive access to early content and strategy guides for my games.
